website_summaries.verdict: Professional-grade wax picks up facial hair you didn't even know you had.
pros: Works especially well for those with dark, coarse hair
Best for eyebrows and upper lips, but may not grip patches of peach fuzz
Ideal for contouring facial hair, with an ability to customize the size of the strips
We love that this product won't exacerbate acne
cons: Can be more painful than other options, given its ability to adhere to most lengths of hair

customer_reviews.title: Skin reaction
customer_reviews.text: This wasn’t great for my skin. I really liked it while I was using it, but days later I broke out and my skin was peeling from it. It took about a week for it to return to normal. As far as hair removal goes, I found I had to go over the same spot multiple times to get the hair removed. It was in these spots that my skin was the worst later on.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: They were very gently on my skin (as gentle as waxing can be) and the after-waxing wipes did a great job of removing residual wa
customer_reviews.text: These are very small strips; a whole box probably wouldn't do both armpits (half are about the size of my pinky, the other half are about double that). They were very gently on my skin (as gentle as waxing can be) and the after-waxing wipes did a great job of removing residual wax and softening my skin. The strips would sometimes do very well, but other times they would leave a majority of the hairs behind. It seemed to be anyone's guess which it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting to purchase this product again, but after my first experience with these wax strips, these are now my go-to for quick, easy, and efficient touch-ups! It would be nice if each package came with more strips, but being able to use them as opposed to a tub of wax has been so beneficial for me. The soothing wipes are great and I love how I don't have to deal with a waxy mess!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Caranto

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: These are a very interesting by I personally wouldn’t buy these again I really didn’t feel like they worked the greatest compared to other brands on the market and I do like the ingredients in this product but the effectiveness wasn’t that
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: This gave me horrible zits where ever I used it on my face ...
customer_reviews.text: This gave me horrible zits where ever I used it on my face and I have completely clear skin. I WOULD NOT recommend it to anyone, whilst the peach fuzz on my face is gone, now there's allergic reaction acne that'll I'll have to treat for probably over a week. Going from clear skin to this is extremely disappointing. I would not use this again, the effects are far too damaging to the complexion.
customer_reviews.author: Elektra

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use on the unibrow of my 13 year old son. I have bought the ones at the store in the past but they just weren't working very well anymore. Tried these out yesterday. With just doing it one time, it got off almost all the hair. It's a hard place to wax because hair is going in all different directions. Ended up doing it twice and then plucking like 3 hairs. Still so much better than what we were doing. I only use a small piece of the strip so as long as they don't dry out before I use them up (kept wrapped in plastic) then I'll keep it at 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: A. Douthit

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, not great
customer_reviews.text: I got these for removing my chest hair after the full waxing kit completely failed to work for me. These strips work reasonably well, but still left a few hairs that I had to tweeze. The biggest problem is that the strips can really only be used once, and they're pretty long, so if you need to wax a large area you're going to plow through them so fast that it might be cheaper to get yourself waxed professionally. As with any waxing, this left my skin red and left some residue that needs to be washed off. Not bad, not great.
customer_reviews.author: Renaissance

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have used many similar products and was impressed with these stripes and will continue to use this brand. I liked the material of the stripes. They came apart easily. Most of the hair was removed on the first try, all on the second. My skin was not irritated. I am 68 and have dry sensitive skin. I did not use the two packets of cleanser, so I used my own oil to remove residue.
customer_reviews.author: JerseyGran

customer_reviews.title: Facial hair remover
customer_reviews.text: They did not remove chin hairs and not even peach fuzz. The wax stuck to my skin even after preparing the skin. Didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great Wax Strips
customer_reviews.text: First time waxing at all. I found this product easy to use. I used it for peach fuzz on the side of my face and for mustache area. I found it a little challenging to use in the upper lip area but this can be attributed to being a first time wax user. I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Nannette Lorenz

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Purchase! !!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time,actually early. The easiest way to heat is a few seconds with a blow dryer. These wax strips removed all the hair pretty much the 1st time. They didn't leave my face red . My face is sensitive, so this is a positive. Being postmenopausal, you tend to get extra facial hair. I don't want a better mustache than my husband has. These strips definitely did the job for me . I will be ordering again! Thank you Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: judy fredricks

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Strips are made of paper and rip easily and not enough was on them to grab the hair.
customer_reviews.author: LHR

customer_reviews.title: So much easier than tweezers
customer_reviews.text: For my eyebrows, I used to use a wax strip from Nair (non-chemical) and these are definitely an improvement over those for the simple reason that they aren't menthol scented. If you're in a pinch friction from your hands will heat them up as they specify but i'd recommend a brief hit from the hair dryer instead (brief!) if you can.
customer_reviews.author: Auggie Greyson

customer_reviews.title: For the price, these wax strips are great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these wax strips are great. I used the small ones for my upper lip and it worked great. No wax was stuck on my skin and washed with warm water after i was finished. I will defiantly order it again.
customer_reviews.author: HNS

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Removed my mustache perfectly. I loved this product. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Cheap for a reason
customer_reviews.text: Not much wax on the strips, and it only got less than half of the hair. If you don't warm them up in your hands enough the wax may stay on one side and not distribute evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Clements

customer_reviews.title: Money down the drain
customer_reviews.text: The wax does not come out on the strips equally when they are peeled apart, making both the strips useless. I have used Flamingo and Veet before, both of which worked pretty well. This one does not work that well.
customer_reviews.author: Sonal Aggarwal

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, little weird at first but is definitely less irritating than standard waxing.
customer_reviews.author: Stefani

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: These might work for blondes, but not for me... Only pulls out about 3/4 of hair. And the hair seems to need to be longer than other brands I've used. I am going with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: What are these for, really? Because they pulled NO hair.
customer_reviews.text: Posting this using my husband's account. I am no newbie to home waxing, I usually buy the Parissa wax strips, or the cans of wax with separate strips. The Body Honee strips are an absolute waste of money, they pulled NO hair. Extremely frustrating. I'll be going back to Parissa since I had to throw all of these in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible. Do not buy! Didn’t remove hair, skin bled and broke out. Scabs for a week.0
customer_reviews.author: Amy Roush

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t wax well!! Wouldn’t even pull the hairs out of my legs or arm!!!
customer_reviews.author: Allison Spalding

customer_reviews.title: I love the wax
customer_reviews.text: I love the wax. It does the trick. I cannot stand that they include a single packet of soothing ointment, so unless you use all your wax strips at once you will be out of finishing oil after the first use. I tried olive oil. It's not the same. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Dinielli

customer_reviews.title: These work Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use just heated a few seconds with my hair dryer pulled them apart and applied to face pulled and great results! Will buy these again!!
customer_reviews.author: Lori S Daly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying these and I love them! Few stray hairs here and there but they work amazing. No sticky wax All over my bathroom sink anymore. Quick, clean and works!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Product was a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Product was a waste of money. I followed the directions implicitly, was not satisfied. The wax strips simply did not work. Perhaps I got a bad batch, but regardless, I will not be buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: tinygard

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gets maybe half of the hairs in any given area. Won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Froodle

customer_reviews.title: The good thing about it is that even I have acne ...
customer_reviews.text: I am using it for my face and it works! The good thing about it is that even I have acne and my skin is sensitive, after using it my face would not be red and it doesn't bother my face. The point is that like other waxes, your hair should not be too short to get good result. For me I think the minimum should be about 1 cm. Also I think its price is reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: No Hairs Removed
customer_reviews.text: Not a single hair was removed during the process of using this product. It hurt, but that was the only result.
customer_reviews.author: FelineFriendly

customer_reviews.title: BodyHonee is much superior to its mainstream competition
customer_reviews.text: BodyHonee is much superior to its mainstream competition. It is made from natural products, is gentle on the skin, and most significantly, doesn't leave the residue which I have experienced with other products of this kind. I'm glad there is now some choice offered!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen B.

customer_reviews.title: I have used way better.
customer_reviews.text: doesn't work well for me. I have used way better.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 1st time self-waxer.
customer_reviews.text: In a neat little package. Easy to use and this was the first time I had not gone to a salon so I was a novice self-waxer. I used a hair dryer to warm the wax strips. This product leaves very little residue so it makes clean up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy R.

customer_reviews.title: I really liked these. I use them on my side burns
customer_reviews.text: I really liked these. I use them on my side burns. a little redness after using but thats to be expected. Aloe vera makes the redness go away in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: marlena

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are clear and they do a great job. A little hard to heat them up by hand but so much more convenient than having to use a microwave. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie

customer_reviews.title: I was sad to find out that they no longer make it
customer_reviews.text: After years of using the same wax, I was sad to find out that they no longer make it. I came across this product and decided to give it a try. I've only used it once so far but I can honestly say that I truly like it! I will definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, certainly a great product
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, certainly a great product. I got red on some area that's quite subjective to the person I guess.
customer_reviews.author: wpubpanon

customer_reviews.title: not really worth the price
customer_reviews.text: leaves too much sticky glue behind compared to NADS and I think too expensive for the few small strips just buy larger one and cut it into the shapes you want to save a few bucks
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Took a few tries
customer_reviews.text: The product wad easy to peel apart, but the wax itself was a little aggrivating. I tried this on my eyebrows and at one point it took five tried to get 60% of the hair off one section. I finally gave up and used tweezers for the rest. The rest of the sections took a few tries as well. In the end, I guess it did what it was supposed to, even if it took a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely terrible. Spent a lot of time warming the strips by rubbing them. But when you peel them the two sided stick to each other. You get one strip with all the wax and that can't pull any hair. Would return if I could
customer_reviews.author: Kavya

customer_reviews.title: Overall unimpressive but they get the job done
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in these when comparing them to other brands such as Nads. The way did not go on nearly as smoothly, did not get as much har, and the two post wax oil wipes included were WAY oily.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Average hair removal strips
customer_reviews.text: While I find these strips incredibly easy to apply and remove, they are average in effectiveness. I find I miss a few hairs with these.
customer_reviews.author: mlk_1078

customer_reviews.title: Hair removal wax strips
customer_reviews.text: My first time using wax strips. Easy to use, does better with fine hair.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Did not work to remove facial hair
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all for facial hair. All it did was leave a sticky residue and did nothing to remove hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First Time User - It Works . . .
customer_reviews.text: First time user. I found that this product works great on my stubborn facial hair and leaves my face smooth. I would say that afterwards there is a little tenderness but that can be expected with waxing. Definitely prefer over creams.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite wax strip
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite wax strip. I found the honey too sticky, and it left lots of residue on my face, without removing adequate amounts of hair. I most likely won't order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Curit

customer_reviews.title: Works too well.
customer_reviews.text: Worked on facial hair but also ripped off many layers of my skin. 1 week later still healing from my whisker shaped scabs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great :(
customer_reviews.text: Size is appropriate but when i tried it, it wasn't great.
customer_reviews.author: coolbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to use for removing hair from upper lip and chin. Quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Atyler529

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother and waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Barely any wax on the strip. Strips are too small and I think Scott tape could do a better job then these strips. Not even one baby hair was removed. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Works. Surprisingly well. Leaves a temporary redness but short lived. Much nicer than tubes of wax or having to heat the wax yourself.
customer_reviews.author: giorgio

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It even gets all the tiny baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It even gets all the tiny baby hairs, the ones that never want to go away and cause breakouts.
customer_reviews.author: Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to use and cleans all unwanted hair. I'll order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ester

customer_reviews.title: These strips irritate my skin a bit more than using ...
customer_reviews.text: These strips irritate my skin a bit more than using hot wax, but they are much easier to use! Much easier clean-up too!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy at all with it
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work as advertised. I am not happy at all with it. The only time it actually removed here, is when it remove the skin as well, causing bleeding.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Butler

customer_reviews.title: I followed the directions and it didn't work as well ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and it didn't work as well as hoped. It missed section in the wax area. I would try with another strip and same thing. Threw out the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not work and I have fine hair! It left all the hair and a sticky residue that was hard to get off. I think they only got 5 stars because some people got "discounts" for their review
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J.

customer_reviews.title: Totally useless. It doesn't remove any hair
customer_reviews.text: Totally useless. It doesn't remove any hair. When I tested with it, it only worked on the finest hair, but even then only partly. It definitely doesn't work on areas it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: soh-yeon lee

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and does the trick.
customer_reviews.text: Product was easy to use and totally painless! Really great for medium to short hair. I feel so confident now!
customer_reviews.author: madeline adams

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Simple to use but does not do much. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Lauryn Walker

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, effective, minimal discomfort. Redness went away in 24 hours. Much better than hard wax or shaving! So glad got this.
customer_reviews.author: Anon123

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These do not get hot enough with my hands or blow dryer and did not work at all
customer_reviews.author: Candyce

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work at all, not sticky enough to pull ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all, not sticky enough to pull out any hairs, might as well have bought a pack of stickers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Worked better than other brands I have tried in the past and did not leave skin red or irritated.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use though
customer_reviews.text: Not really strong enough all hair removal . Very easy to use though.
customer_reviews.author: kelly ambron

customer_reviews.title: Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works like a charm. Not too hard on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: nancy j. martin

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent customer service. On time, great product. 100% satisfied No complain! I would personally recommend this company to anyone anytime!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have used better brands. This works ok, was hoping for better.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Good but not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: Product is good but not as nice as sugar wax. Good for grooming maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: K M

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The strips are too thin not enough wax on the strips
customer_reviews.author: LyndaC.

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Contains right amount of wax in each strips that helps strip of hair in first attempt.Tried different products for hair removal within amazon but only this fits the bell.
customer_reviews.author: happygirl

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs down!
customer_reviews.text: Not a big fan of these. The wax would get stuck on me and was just awful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Box came in the mail open, product all over. It did not work worth a darn. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Krivanek

customer_reviews.title: As good as a salon wax
customer_reviews.text: BodyHonee wax strips do a great job of getting rid of unwanted hair. It does as good a job as a salon wax at a fraction of the price and in the privacy of your home.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Neer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: easy to use and delivers the promise. Will definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time or money on BodyHonee
customer_reviews.text: Product not effective, don't know how to explain other than it is a very poor "sticky" material and clumsy to try and use
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: All pain and no gain
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how these work for women with fine hair. But I have thicker courser hair than some. They didn't work at all. I followed the instructions to a T and all I got was pain and zero gain. I tried them on my calves and my thighs. It just yanks the hair, turns my skin very red, hurts, and didn't pull out so much as a single strand. I even tried it on the very fine hair on my upper lip. Didn't do a thing. If they do work for you, I don't see how anyone could wax much of anything with how few of the strips are in the box and how tiny they are.
customer_reviews.author: EvangelineM

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Awful. Didn't even remove hair just left sticky residue on skin. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not going to use again
customer_reviews.text: This being my first time attempting to wax myself, I did not love this product. I used for my eyebrows and after it was done my one eyebrow stayed red and hurting for a few days. 3 days later, the skin is peeling off of my eyebrow. Not sure what happened but wasn't looking for that. Afterwards, I still had to tweeze a decent amount. I also tried to wax my bikini line using these strips and it got some hair out but not all of it. I ended up shaving instead.
customer_reviews.author: Julia M. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked these very much. Definitely better than any store bought brands that I have used!
customer_reviews.author: s.esquibel

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well they removed the hair... But also took some skin with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, wax on the skin cleans very easily, does not feel sticky after cleaning. The best was strips I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not remove hair effectively.
customer_reviews.text: I normally go to get a professional service. I bought this one because I didn't have time to get waxed professionally. What a dissapointment. This does a very poor job of removing hair. With this product, I had to do the same area multiple times. I have no point of comparison with another product, but I am sure I won't be buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: orange

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a repeat customer. These are way better than Sally Hanson and still affordable. I will be buying again
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: did not work well at all...barely got any hairs off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The wax never hardens to peel off. It sticks ...
customer_reviews.text: The wax never hardens to peel off. It sticks to your skin and makes a mess. Never buying again. Took off maybe 10 hairs at a time, and only the finest ones. If you have coarse dark hair - this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Hoot

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't do much for me. I used more than one strip repeated on one spot and still there was still hair. i just gave up and trashed everything. Maybe it just doesn't work for coarse hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my upper lip and they seemed to work pretty well. This was my first time trying wax strips and they removed about 80% of the hair with one try and minimal pain. The strips left a lot of sticky residue; most of it comes off with a hot shower and vigorous rubbing with a wet towel. Now you can't tell the residue is there unless you touch the skin. I figure the rest of it will be gone tomorrow. I would probably by these again, but I might try out other brands too. Also, if you're inexperienced with waxing make sure to do your research to avoid breakouts and damage to your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tanaia Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I gave up half way through waxing using this product. I went through about 8 full strips (16 waxes) trying to do my underarms (Yes, I did follow the instructions). While the 16 strips did take off some hair(thus the 2 stars), there was so much hair left over that I gave up, and just shaved the rest. This might be due to how THIN the strips are- they are about the same size as some of my face wax strips- so they are inefficient over larger surfaces like your underarms
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: I like the ingredient list and they seem to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: I never review things, but these work really well. I like the ingredient list and they seem to be a very good value. I usually make my own wax from honey and sugar, but these are much easier to use. After using the product 3 times, I can say they work wonderfully! I have the hang of it, now. Just make sure to warm completely before use and apply a fine layer of cornstarch or other powder first. This helps to shield your skin from any irritation. Do not reapply over the same area. I will purchase them again! The little towelettes work well, too. You can also remove any excess wax by doing the oil cleansing method.
customer_reviews.author: trying to organize

customer_reviews.title: It works. No mess.
customer_reviews.text: I tried this last night on my upper lip. It was easy to apply and there is no mess at all. I had some redness afterwards but this morning there is no irritation. It was painful but that's good because it means it got everything, whiskers to baby hair, all gone. See pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F

customer_reviews.title: Very sensitive skin? Ok. Hair removal? Fail.
customer_reviews.text: Bonus points: My sensitive skin which reacts poorly to almost everything didn't react poorly to the wax. The problem? It removed all of 1 hair on my 4th attempt. I tried via the instructions to remove some unsightly facial hair. I tried a few different directions, all I ended up with was sticky hair and skin. I may try again at a later point but I can't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eze S

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Useless in removing any substantial amount of hair. I didn’t believe the negative review and I wish I did
customer_reviews.author: Huda

customer_reviews.title: Not enough stick
customer_reviews.text: Works, but isn’t as sticky as it should be so I have to do it a few different times and then still use a tweezers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, no mess.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while. I personally use it for my eyebrows. I just cut out the shaoe I need from the strips and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: It was really bad for my face skin's
customer_reviews.text: It was really bad for my face skin's: ( AT FIRST I THOUGHT IT'S GOOD BECAUSE IT DOESN'T CAUSE so much PAIN, BUT AFTER A DAY I HAD TO MUCH BOMBS AND SOME PLACES were BURNt ! It's work good with my hand's back but, it's also dosn't work with thcik hair. I will never buy it agian.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan K.

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, but Not as Great as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Don't really work on thick/ dark/ coarse hair like they should. Leaves your skin sticky afterwards and the stickiness is SO HARD to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Joyfull

customer_reviews.title: Worked Nicely
customer_reviews.text: This works pretty well. It took me a couple strips to figure out the best way to use it. It did not leave red areas. I put a cold pack on the spots as soon as I pulled off the strip. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my mom's upper lip and it worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Practical, was strips I can use until I go to my waxer.
customer_reviews.author: AAJ

customer_reviews.title: but in a pinch they do a good job --without massive facial redness for hours
customer_reviews.text: Worked just as well as other wax strips I've tried, only without the irritation. These aren't as effective as hard wax, but in a pinch they do a good job --without massive facial redness for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C.

product_meta.title: Hair Removal Wax Strips Face, Underarms & Bikini, 24 Count
product_meta.description:
These strips are suggested for women's use only. Men can use this on their brow area. 
Ready-to-Use Wax Strips Face, Underarms + Bikini: Remove hair anywhere, anytime, with our quick and easy-to-use hair removal wax strips for Face, Underarms, And Bikini. Formulated with plant-based Chlorophyll, our natural anti-inflammatory formula will instantly soothe and calm the skin, leaving you hair free and silky smooth for up to 8 weeks! 

. Indications: Check to see if your hair is past the “stubbly” stage. VidaSleek wax strips work on hair between 1/4”- 1/2” long. If the hair is longer, trim it before you wax to avoid discomfort. For best results, wait at least 21 days before using on areas you’ve shaved or treated with cream hair removers. Make Sure your skin is dry and completely free of creams, lotions, deodorants, oils, and sweat before applying wax strip onto skin. DO NOT use on moles, scars, broken, irritated, or sunburnt skin or on skin that has had adverse reactions to waxes in the past. If you are on any medication which can affect the skin or if you suffer from any skin related disorders, check with your doctor before waxing. Wait 2 hours after taking a shower or bath before waxing. Do not sunbathe 24 hours before or after use. If you are elderly, diabetic, or taking oral or topical retinoids, waxing is not suitable.KEEP OUT OF REACH OF CHILDREN. 

Complete Pack Includes: 24 Wax Strips Total: 6 (X2 Sided) Medium Wax Strips 6 (X2 Sided) Small Wax Strips 2 soothing post depilatory cleansing towelettes. 

Benefits: Remain hair free for up to 8 weeks!, All Natural – Non Toxic – No Preservatives, Cruelty Free
feature_bullets: Hair Removal Wax strips for WOMEN: Face, Underarms, Bikini.
Great For Touch-Ups And Travel - Remain hair-free for up to 6+ weeks!
Made with soothing, anti-inflammatory plant-based chlorophyll
Pack of 24 Small + Medium wax strips made for Face, Underarms, + Bikini. Includes 2 post wax soothing wipes.
